name: swarm-monitor
description: A server for storing logs and reports from swarm apps

scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- build/test --recursive --no-timeouts --require source-map-support/register || true
scripts.package: rm -f docker/worker/app.package.tar.gz && rm -f docker/worker/package.json && rimraf build && tsc -p src/ && cp package.json docker/worker/package.json && tar czf app.package.tar.gz build && mv app.package.tar.gz docker/worker/app.package.tar.gz && rimraf build

author: Joey Lappin <joey@swarmnyc.com>
